parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|, I am the Sorcerer's Guild Leader here in Taros, Cirius. I can teach you {spells} if you are interested...and a Sorcerer.
I have mastered the knowledge of magic levels {0}, {2}, {4} and {15}. For which do you wish to learn?
I know a few spells for new sorcerers. I am able to teach you {Lesser Heal} and {Lesser Light}.
For magic level 2 I am able to teach you {Heal}, {Lesser Energy Strike}, {Lesser Death Strike} and {Lesser Holy Strike}.
For magic level 4 I am able to teach you {Light}, {Lesser Energy Missiles}, {Lesser Electrify} and {Lesser Torment}.
For magic level 15 I am able to teach you {Greater Light}.
